data.name: Tester
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct://test-{{source}}"/>
    <setBody>
        <simple>
<![CDATA[{{escapeMessage (ternary data.code data.code code)}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setBody>
    {{setHeaderList data.headers}}
    {{setPropertyList data.properties}}
    <to uri="micrometer:counter:inject_counter_total?increment=1"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
